## Highlights

Some of George Washington's major roles:

* Commander of the Continental Army
* Member of the Continental Congress
* Presided over the Constitutional Convention
* First President of the United States 

## Personal Life

* Married Martha Custis
* Plantation owner: Mount Vernon

## Death

[Iatrogenic](http://www.merriam-webster.com/medical/iatrogenic) cause: "heroic bleeding" in response to a throat inflamation.
